sentences.sContent: It s also the first germanium laser to operate at room temperature.
sentences.sContent_eng: It s also the first germanium laser to operate at room temperature.
sentences.sCn: 这同样也是第一速在室温下得到控制的锗激光。

sentences.sContent: The researchers inject pairs of electrons and holes into the germanium.
sentences.sContent_eng: The researchers inject pairs of electrons and holes into the germanium.
sentences.sCn: 研究者们注射成对的电子和凹陷到锗中。

sentences.sContent: Changing the angle and length of the bonds between germanium atoms also changed the energies required to kick their electrons into the conduction band.
sentences.sContent_eng: Changing the angle and length of the bonds between germanium atoms also changed the energies required to kick their electrons into the conduction band.
sentences.sCn: 改变锗原子的连接角度和长度的同时，将它们的电子踢到传导带所需的能量也变化了。

trans.tranOther: a brittle crystalline grey element that is a semiconducting metalloid, occurring principally in zinc ores and argyrodite: used in transistors, as a catalyst, and to strengthen and harden alloys
